paper_abstract: Recently, the modified q-Euler numbers and polynomials with weight alpha are introduced in [15]. In this paper, we give some interesting identities on the modified q-Euler numbers and polynomials with weight alpha and q-Bernstein polynomials. These results are different from those in [11].
paper_title: IDENTITIES ON THE MODIFIED q-EULER AND q-BERNSTEIN POLYNOMIALS AND NUMBERS WITH WEIGHT
